text:
#Covid19 #AZ #Vaccine

JCVI reports: it is preferable for under-30s to be offered #Pfizer or #Moderna instead of #AstraZeneca due to small number of blood clots.

Prof Van-Tam presents a course correction, explains very succinctly and clearly the benefits versus the risks. https://t.co/0SJLBBm4Mh https://t.co/hHO2KF4s6x
